Plot: Terry Gilliam's doomed attempt to get his film, The Man Who Killed Don Quixote (2017), off the ground.
Title: Lost in La Mancha
Actors: Tony Grisoni, Philip A. Patterson, René Cleitman, Terry Gilliam
tomatoConsensus: A remarkable behind-the-scenes look at a movie that wasn't, Lost in La Mancha is an incisive, entertaining document of the difficulties inherent in the moviemaking process.
